arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
Aldkin chains up to {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} enemies to himself, Tethering to them and dealing {if:SF_10}{c_number}{dot:TETHER}{/c}{else}moderate{/if} Shadow damage over {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds. 

When the chains expire, they deal {if:SF_10}{c_number}{payload:BREAK_PAYLOAD}{/c}{else}light{/if} Shadow damage and Stun their victims for {c_number}[{SF_8}|1|]{/c} |4second;seconds.
